channel.title: Tollymore on Keith's Diary and Other Stuff
channel.description: Recent content in Tollymore on Keith's Diary and Other Stuff

item.title: Tollymore
item.description: Silent Valley Spent the 12th weekend in Tollymore Forest Park with the Lyttles. Saturday we all cycled by Spelga, Silent Valley and into Newcastle stopping at the Carrick Cottage Cafe for the necessary sustenance, and if that wasn’t enough ice cream in Newcastle.
